name: Version displayed by the binary is for current release

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
Version displayed by the binary is for current release
————————————————————————————
ON FINAL BUILD FOR THE RELEASE:
  1. Go to https://github.com/mattermost/mmctl/releases and find the Windows .zip file for the current release, download it and unzip it to your computer
  2. Open a command window and go to the directory you unzipped the Windows .zip file to in the above test e.g. `C:Users\Lindy\Downloads\mmctl_530`
  3. Run `mmctl.exe`
  4. Run `mmctl version`
inline.expectedResult: • The version should match the version of Mattermost being released
